testcase.classname: Login functionality test for Smart Banking
testcase.name: Login should not pass with null username and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given opened the browser....................................................passed And go to application login page............................................passed When enter null username....................................................passed And enter valid password....................................................passed And click the login button..................................................passed Then login should fail & invalid username or password message should be visible.passed
